DynaCASE

Showcase video for ESUG 2015

Installation

Get latest "stable" image from Jenkins (DynaCASE.zip)

The image is also available in Pharo Launcher in Pharo Contributions Jenkins template.

After launching the image open DynaCASE from world menu.

Blank screen issue

If you see blank screen after opening DynaCASE, such as depicted, clicking anywhere on the window or reopening it should make it work until the issue is properly resolved.
